actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1902 of title 38 of the United States Code to require that powered lifting devices be provided to disabled persons eligible for specially adapted automobiles.

summary.text: Requires that powered lifting devices be provided to disabled persons eligible for specially adapted automobiles. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1902)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1902 of title 38 of the United States Code to require that powered lifting devices be provided to disabled persons eligible for specially adapted automobiles.
